NC.Q: Between 1977 and 1994, did the total Home Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 1977 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total home sales between {1977} and {1994} was {larger} than between {1977} and {1978}.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2003, was the average total Home Sales higher or lower than between 1978 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total home sales between {2001} and {2003} was {higher} than between {1978} and {1993}.
